data.message: Just been left less than satisfied by a Coca Cola vending machine at Bradford Royal infirmary. Ate my last £1.40 and no drink. Rung the the helpline number but no one is in. Sorry to say left "feeling" somewhat annoyed.

replies.message: Hi Czeslaw, you must've phoned when our lines were closed. Could you please try calling us again on 01908 822228 (option 4). Alternatively please fill out our contact form and we'll get in touch as soon as possible http://spr.ly/6186B04H4. Thanks
Coca-Cola  I have just completed the refund request form thank you.
